resources.string: High Speed Volume: The music volume played while at or above the maximum speed specified.
Low Speed Volume: The music volume played while at or below the minimum speed specified. Also, the volume used while Lift Check detects you are on a lift.
Minimum Speed: Moving slower than the minimum speed will set the volume to the Low Speed Volume.
Maximum Speed: Moving faster than the maximum speed will set the volume to the High Speed Volume.
Lift Check: Checking the lift check means the app will set the volume to the Low Speed Volume when senses you are on a lift.
Refresh Rate: The rate the app retrieves GPS information in seconds. A shorter refresh rate will be more accurate but use more battery.
Automatic Start: When Automatic Start is checked the app will adjust music volume on start up, otherwise there is a button on the main screen to start and stop adjusting music volume
